body: @redo well, this site doesn't upload videos and I doubt that anyone actually searched for this on the site. besides they just upload whatever "new" stuff they can find on the internet. look at some doujin, despite being the same, getting uploaded multiple times

@nhentaiview That was interesting, thanks. Though is weird why they would keep doing this, or at least uploading it here. If you can get to this page, you surely can find the video somewhere on the internet right?
Believe it or not, this type of manga actually did happen (no internet or satellite TV back then). Just letting y'all know...
wow, never had I thought, there would be such a smartass here, indeed. Well Played.

I don't see anything wrong with it.
This was actually pretty popular back during the VCD time.
For kids in asia, this type of "anime captions manga" was the alternative of watching popular anime series (such as pokemon or digimon) due to not having the right TV channels and/or unable to record.
Take pictures from hentai itself and make it into a doujinshi with captions on it. Well Played.
